hero.title: We Transform Your Ideas Into Digital Solutions
hero.description: A company specialized in developing apps and websites. We design innovative software solutions that support your business growth and deliver a high-quality user experience, built on a genuine understanding of your needs and goals.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We believe technology is more than just code
about.description1: At Liwan Coding, we believe that technology is not just code, but a tool for building real value.
about.description2: We provide smart, customized software solutions that help companies and entrepreneurs transform their ideas into reliable, scalable, and user-friendly digital products.
about.description3: We work with passion, focus on quality, and place user experience at the heart of everything we deliver.

services.title: What We Offer
services.subtitle: A comprehensive suite of software services to meet modern business needs

service1.title: Mobile App Development
service1.description: Professional applications for iOS and Android systems, with high performance and smooth user experience.

service2.title: Website Development
service2.description: Modern, fast, and responsive websites that reflect your project's identity and support your goals.

service3.title: Custom Software Solutions
service3.description: Systems designed specifically to fit your business nature, whether platforms, dashboards, or internal systems.

service4.title: UI/UX Design
service4.description: We focus on designing attractive and easy-to-use interfaces that enhance user satisfaction and increase engagement.

process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: A clear methodology that ensures quality and commitment at every stage

step1.title: Understanding Ideas & Requirements
step1.description: We start by listening and analyzing to understand your needs precisely.

step2.title: Design & Planning
step2.description: We design user experience and a well-thought-out technical structure before starting development.

step3.title: Development & Implementation
step3.description: We write clean, scalable code using best practices.

step4.title: Launch & Support
step4.description: We launch the project with confidence and provide ongoing support and improvement after delivery.

whyUs.title: Why Liwan Coding?
whyUs.subtitle: Because we don't offer ready-made solutions, we build solutions tailored for you
whyUs.reason1: High commitment to quality and technical standards
whyUs.reason4: Clear and transparent communication at all stages
whyUs.reason5: A true partnership, not just execution

projects.title: Our Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: We are proud to implement quality projects in various fields
projects.feature4: Delivering solutions that serve end users and achieve business goals
projects.quote: We believe that the success of our clients' projects is the best proof of our work quality.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We strive to be a trusted technology partner, contributing to building digital products that support digital transformation, enhance business growth, and deliver sustainable value to society.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitleLine2: We'd love to hear from you
contact.description: If you have a project, idea, or inquiry — we'd be happy to connect with you and discuss how we can help.
contact.name: Name
